General.Name: Display Tech Co. Ltd
General.Description: Display Tech Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells LCD modules worldwide. It offers mobile devices, MP3, PMP, MID, GPS, notebooks, and laptop computer display solutions. The company's products include TN/CSTN/TFT LCD modules and TFT panel back-end products. It also supplies 3D shutter glasses. Display Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Anseong, South Korea.
